Key Match Events: Guehi received a yellow card in the 3' minute
Mainoo received a yellow card in the 7' minute
Bellingham received a yellow card in the 17' minute
Kucka received a yellow card in the 13' minute
Skriniar received a yellow card in the 45+1' minute
Pekarik received a yellow card in the 77' minute
Vavro received a yellow card in the 108' minute
Gyomber received a yellow card in the 114' minute
Suslov received a yellow card in the 120+1' minute
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Gordon has staked his claim to start for England in the Euro 2024 last-16 clash with Slovakia, stating that he is a 'nightmare for anyone he plays against'
Gordon was named Newcastle's Player of the Season for 2023-24 after scoring 12 goals and registering 11 assists in 48 appearances across all competitions

There have been calls from many supporters and pundits for Gordon to be handed a start on the left side of England's attack against Slovakia, potentially replacing Phil Foden who has just returned to the first-team camp after attending the birth of his third child in the UK
Others: Gordon suffered a heavy fall following a high-speed electric bike accident but is fit to feature against Slovakia
It remains to be seen whether left-back Luke Shaw, who has not played since February due to a muscle injury, will be ready to be involved against Slovakia
